summary: This document is an email forwarding a signed search warrant for three electronic devices from Jeffrey Epstein's New York residence. It appears to be correspondence between legal or law enforcement personnel regarding the execution of the warrant as part of the ongoing investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The search warrant is for devices from his New York residence, indicating continued investigative activity related to his case.

events.title: Signing of search warrant for Epstein devices
events.description: A search warrant was signed authorizing the seizure of three electronic drives from Jeffrey Epstein's New York residence.

keyFacts: A signed search warrant was obtained for three electronic devices from Jeffrey Epstein's New York residence.
The warrant was signed on or around October 27, 2020.
This indicates investigative activity related to the Epstein case was ongoing in late 2020, after his death.
The document is part of email correspondence forwarding the warrant, likely between prosecutors and law enforcement.
